newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Richmond, Va..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Richmond, Va..

text.p: Sealed bids will be received by the Director of Finance of the City of Richmond, Virginia (the

at the Offices of Wilder & Gregory, Eighth and Main Building, 707 East Main Street, 10th Floor, Richmond, Virginia, for the purchase of $5,895,000 General Obligation Serial Equipment Notes, Series 1997 (the Notes''). The Notes will be issued by means of a book-entry system with no distribution of physical note certificates made to the public. The Notes will be issued in fully registered form, will be dated their date of issuance and delivery, which is scheduled for June 24, 1997, and will mature serially on May 15 in each of the years 1998 through 2002, inclusive. Notes maturing on or after May 15, 2000, will be callable on or after May 15, 1999, as described in the City's detailed Official Notice of Sale. The Notes will be general obligations of the City, secured by a pledge of its full faith and credit. The approving opinions of Lewis, Clay, Munday, Wilder & Gregory, Richmond, Virginia, and Hunton & Williams, Richmond, Virginia, will be furnished to the successful bidder at the City's expense. The Notes will be awarded to the responsible bidder who offers to purchase the Notes at the lowest interest cost to the City and who complies with the City's equal employment opportunity requirements and submission of required

documents, all as provided in the detailed Official Notice of Sale. Additional information, including the detailed Official Notice of Sale, the Official Bid Form and the Preliminary Official Statement, may be obtained from the undersigned, 10th Floor, City Hall, 900 E. Broad Street, Richmond, Virginia 23219 (telephone 804/780-5829).
